<small>Aramaic form: [[H7243]]</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּעָה‎</span><sub>316</sub> **noun masculine** and **feminine** ==four== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>8</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבען‎</span> = 40; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבע‎</span>, Punic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבעת‎</span>, ***four***; so Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***arba'u***</u></abbr> (rarely <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***irba°***</u></abbr>), <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***irbitti***</u></abbr>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבעת‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 232.2</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrest. 47</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבְּעָה‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבע‎</span>, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארבעא‎</span>, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>367</sup>); — 

**masculine**<sub>148</sub> (c. **noun feminine**) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span> (absolute or construct) [[Exod.21.37|Exod 21:37]] +; also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּ֑ע‎</span> [[Lev.11.20|Lev 11:20]] +; note ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]]) [[Josh.21.18|Josh 21:18]] +6 t. [[Josh.21|Josh 21]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּ֑ל‎</span>); in [[Prov.30.18|Prov 30:18]] read **feminine** ==with [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]==; **feminine** (c. **noun masculine**) absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּעָה‎</span> [[Gen.2.10|Gen 2:10]] + 125 t. + [[Prov.30.18|Prov 30:18]] (see above); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּ֫עַת‎</span> [[1Sam.4.2|1Sam 4:2]] + 29 t., including [[Ezek.7.2|Ezek 7:2]] (but read **masculine** [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּעְתָּם‎</span> [[Ezek.1.8|Ezek 1:8]] + 5 t. Ezekiel, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּעְתָּן‎</span> [[Ezek.1.10|Ezek 1:10]] (twice in verse) (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּם‎</span>-, [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]), v[[Ezek.1.16|Ezek 1:16]] v[[Ezek.1.18|Ezek 1:18]] dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּעְתָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[2Sam.12.6|2Sam 12:6]], see **1 d**; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּעִים‎</span> = 40, see below; — ***four*** (in Hexateuch 108 t., chiefly [[BDB#P|P]], 98 t.; [[Ezek.52|Ezek 52]] t., Chronicles 47 t.): — 

**1.** without other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span> (1) before feminine plural noun [[Jer.15.3|Jer 15:3]]; [[Exod.25.12|Exod 25:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + 101 t., including <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמּוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Deut.3.11|Deut 3:11]] + 5 t. (but also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאַמָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> ***four (in) cubit(s)*** [[Exod.26.2|Exod 26:2]]; [[Exod.26.8|Exod 26:8]]; [[Exod.36.9|Exod 36:9]]; [[1Kgs.7.27|1Kgs 7:27]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.7.38|1Kgs 7:38]]), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> = 400 [[Gen.11.13|Gen 11:13]] + 55 t. (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> before dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַנְלָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Lev.11.23|Lev 11:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלָיו‎</span> [[Exod.25.26|Exod 25:26]]. (3) before collective, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Exod.21.37|Exod 21:37]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִבּוֺא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> = 40,000 [[Ezra.2.64|Ezra 2:64]] = [[Neh.7.66|Neh 7:66]]. (4) rare and late, after feminine plural noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִים א‎</span> [[Josh.19.7|Josh 19:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); after feminine singular noun construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת א‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.41|1Kgs 22:41]]; [[Zech.7.1|Zech 7:1]]; [[2Chr.3.2|2Chr 3:2]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרְיַת א‎</span>, see this, and II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span> below (5) noun omitted [[Ezek.43.15|Ezek 43:15]]b [[Prov.30.15|Prov 30:15]]; [[Prov.30.18|Prov 30:18]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]], see above), v[[Prov.30.21|Prov 30:21]]; [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]]; [[Dan.8.22|Dan 8:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאַֿרְבַּ֑ל‎</span> (that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגלים‎</span> = on all fours [[Lev.11.20|Lev 11:20]]; [[Lev.11.21|Lev 11:21]]; [[Lev.11.27|Lev 11:27]]; [[Lev.11.42|Lev 11:42]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּעָה‎</span> (1) before masculine plural noun [[Gen.2.10|Gen 2:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.14.9|Gen 14:9]]; [[Exod.25.34|Exod 25:34]] + 21 t., + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֳדָשִׁים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִים (וְ)א‎</span> [[Judg.19.2|Judg 19:2]]; [[1Sam.27.7|1Sam 27:7]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> distributive [[Ezek.10.21|Ezek 10:21]]. (2) late, after masculine plural noun [[1Chr.23.10|1Chr 23:10]]. (3) noun omitted, [[Amos.1.3|Amos 1:3]]; [[Amos.1.6|Amos 1:6]]; [[Amos.1.9|Amos 1:9]] + 15 t., .+ (as predicate of masculine plural noun) [[Exod.27.16|Exod 27:16]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.38.19|Exod 38:19]] (twice in verse); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּא‎</span>, (that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span>) [[Zech.7.1|Zech 7:1]] = ordinal, ***on the fourth*** (day). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּ֫עַת‎</span> (1) before masculine plural noun [[Judg.11.40|Judg 11:40]]; [[1Kgs.7.32|1Kgs 7:32]] + 11 t. (not [[Ezek.7.2|Ezek 7:2]], see above), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲלָפִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> = 4000, [[1Sam.4.2|1Sam 4:2]] + 14 t. (2) before collective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבָּקָר‎</span> [[Num.7.7|Num 7:7]]. (3) noun omitted [[2Sam.21.22|2Sam 21:22]]. (4) with suffix, after plural noun, = ***the four of them***, [[Ezek.1.8|Ezek 1:8]]; [[Ezek.1.10|Ezek 1:10]] (3 t. in verse) + 6 t. Ezekiel; [[Dan.1.17|Dan 1:17]] ***these boys, the four of them.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּעְתָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[2Sam.12.6|2Sam 12:6]] = ***four-fold*** [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97h»§ 97h</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>11. l, 227</sup>, but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָתָ֑יִם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]. 

**2.** with other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** (1) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבַּע עֶשְׂרֵה‎</span> = 14, (a) before feminine singular noun, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Gen.31.41|Gen 31:41]], + (as ordinal, = ***14th***) [[Gen.14.5|Gen 14:5]]; [[2Kgs.18.13|2Kgs 18:13]]v = [[Isa.36.1|Isa 36:1]]; [[Ezek.40.1|Ezek 40:1]]. (<span class="bdbLangGreek">β</span>) after feminine plural noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִים א‎</span> [[Josh.15.36|Josh 15:36]] + 8 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׁים א‎</span> [[2Chr.13.21|2Chr 13:21]]. (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר‎</span> = ***14***, (a) before masculine singular noun [[Num.17.14|Num 17:14]] (14 x 1000), [[Job.42.12|Job 42:12]] especially (as ordinal) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> ***14th day*** [[Exod.12.6|Exod 12:6]]; [[Exod.12.18|Exod 12:18]] + 7 t. ***(b)*** before masculine plural noun [[Num.29.15|Num 29:15]]. (<span class="bdbLangGreek">γ</span>) after, masculine plural noun [[Num.29.13|Num 29:13]]; [[Num.29.17|Num 29:17]] + 6 t. (<span class="bdbLangGreek">δ</span>) after masculine singular noun [[Esth.9.15|Esth 9:15]]; [[Esth.9.19|Esth 9:19]]; [[Esth.9.21|Esth 9:21]], all = ***14th*** (<span class="bdbLangGreek">ε</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> predicate of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Gen.46.22|Gen 46:22]]. <span class="bdbLangGreek">ζ</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> = ***14th*** (that is, day) [[Lev.23.15|Lev 23:15]]; [[2Chr.30.15|2Chr 30:15]] + 6 t. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** 20 + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(וְׅ‎</span> 4 + singular noun [[1Kgs.15.33|1Kgs 15:33]]; [[1Chr.23.4|1Chr 23:4]] + 13 t. [[1Chr.27|1Chr 27]] + plural noun [[Num.7.88|Num 7:88]] noun omitted [[2Sam.21.20|2Sam 21:20]] predicate \|\| [[1Chr.20.6|1Chr 20:6]]; [[Neh.7.23|Neh 7:23]] 4 + 20 + singular noun [[Num.25.9|Num 25:9]] = ***24th***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם ע‎</span> [[Hag.1.15|Hag 1:15]]; [[Hag.1.18|Hag 1:18]]; [[Zech.1.7|Zech 1:7]]; [[Neh.9.1|Neh 9:1]]; [[Dan.10.4|Dan 10:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> omitted [[Hag.2.10|Hag 2:10]]; [[Hag.2.20|Hag 2:20]], and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>) [[1Chr.24.18|1Chr 24:18]]; [[1Chr.25.31|1Chr 25:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** other tens + 4, [[1Chr.7.7|1Chr 7:7]]; [[1Chr.5.18|1Chr 5:18]] (+ singular noun), [[Ezra.2.15|Ezra 2:15]] + 7 t.; 4 + tens + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> [[Gen.11.16|Gen 11:16]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֶף‎</span> 1000 [[Num.1.27|Num 1:27]]; [[Num.1.29|Num 1:29]]; [[Num.2.4|Num 2:4]]; [[Num.2.6|Num 2:6]]; [[Num.26.25|Num 26:25]]; [[Num.26.43|Num 26:43]]. — See [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, § 106</sup>.
